title: Banned 14 days toxicity Rewards?
body: I was wondering what the cut off date for receiving your end of season rewards was? I remember a few years ago it was august 14th I'm pretty sure. Was just wondering what the stipulations were for Season 7 when it comes to receiving your end of season rewards

replies.body: We haven't quite announced the ending date for the 2017 season AFAIK, so it's a little hard to narrow down the exact date. Keep in mind that one who has been issued a ban of 7 or more days within three months of the season's end will not be eligible for rewards. [**This page is for the 2016 season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/228380727), but most of the stipulations still apply.

I'm just curious I don't think it's really fair that I was issued a 14 day ban right away when it states that you start out with a 10 then 25 game chat ban, not making excuses cause me being toxic wasn't right but if I would of got the chat ban it would of made me realize that I was going to get a ban right after just kindoff a flaw in the system it seems like :/

Yea.....I can imagine it must not have felt too good to skip passed a chat ban, but our [**instant feedback system**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h1q4) has certain words that are simply not alright in any context. If you'd like, reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can go over everything with you.
